scripts.postbuild: cp -v .htaccess build/.htaccess && cp -v build/static/js/main.*.js build/static/js/main.js && cp -v build/static/js/main.*.js.map build/static/js/main.js.map && cp -v build/static/css/main.*.css build/static/css/main.css && cp -v build/static/css/main.*.css.map build/static/css/main.css.map
